short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds the item number to the front page of every search

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds the item number to woodcraft items. This makes it easier when trying to look up an item as you no longer have to click on it. The screenshot provided shows an example of how the addon adds an item number to every search result.
